name: Anitrek Coloring - ABC & 123 learning app for Kids
name_original: Anitrek Coloring - ABC & 123 learning app for Kids
description:
Enjoy an animal safari while coloring 36 beautiful pages of Alphabets Animals with Anitrek Coloring.

Children can choose from 35 different colors and learn the alphabet at the same time. Enhance artistic creativity and learn about animals in their natural surroundings. Along with the alphabet, basic words are also introduced into their vocabulary.
The soothing voice guides them through correct pronunciations and playful animations keep them interested in learning and focused on fun.

Comes with amazing features this game will surely be on hit list of both Parents and Kids.

FEATURES:

- Universal App (works perfectly on all iOS devices)
- 26 Animal Alphabets Coloring pages.
- 10 pages of Numbers Coloring.
- A Drawing board (Kids can draw freely anything on drawing board using 35 colors and 10 patterns).
- 35 colors & 10 patterns for painting.
- Three brush sizes for Painting and Erasing.
- Beautiful sounds for Kids to understand the User Interface.
- Share your creations with the whole world through Facebook and Twitter. You can also mail it to your friends and take a print out and stick it on your wall.

Download Anitrek Coloring App today. A wonderful experience for kids and Family.

***Free version includes in-app purchasing of additional coloring pages and patterns***
